en-US.summary: Prove you're not a mouthbreather with your Stranger Things knowledge.
en-US.name: Stranger Things Trivia
en-US.description: Do you believe you're a Stranger Things expert? See if you've got what it takes to join the party and defeat the evil of the Upside Down. Answer 11 questions, and if you get them all correct, congratulations! You have the truest of sight.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This was built using the Trivia Sample.
